W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: Countless visions unfold before your eyes. Could one of them lead you to your cat?

W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_EXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_EXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W14_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a cat.
